Class ChromeSocket

Fields
destroyed: bool
disconnected: bool
readStream: Stream
socketId: int
writeSink: EventSink
Getters and Setters
readStream: Stream<List<int>>
writeSink: EventSink<List<int>>
Methods
connect(String hostname, int port): Future<ChromeSocket>
create(ChromeSocketType type): Future<ChromeSocket>
destroy(): void
disconnect(): void
toString(): String

Use the chrome.socket module to send and receive data over the network using TCP and UDP connections.

Fields

bool destroyed
bool disconnected
final Stream readStream
int socketId
final EventSink writeSink

Getters and Setters

Stream<List<int>> get readStream

Return a Stream of input data from this socket. This method can only be called once.

EventSink<List<int>> get writeSink

Return an EventSink to write data to this socket.

Methods

Future<ChromeSocket> connect(String hostname, int port)

Connects the socket to the remote machine (for a tcp socket). For a udp socket, this sets the default address which packets are sent to and read from for read() and write() calls.

static Future<ChromeSocket> create(ChromeSocketType type)

Creates a socket of the specified type.

void destroy()

Destroys the socket. Each socket created should be destroyed after use.

void disconnect()

Disconnects the socket. For UDP sockets, disconnect is a non-operation but is safe to call.

String toString()

Returns a string representation of this object.

Class ChromeSocketType

Static Fields

UDP: ChromeSocketType
Fields
value: String

One of TCP or UDP.
